snippet: More than a dozen members of Congress, mostly women from the Senate and House Armed Services Committees, met with Valerie Jarrett, a senior adviser to Mr. Obama.
abstract: More than a dozen members of Congress, mostly women from Senate and House Armed Services Committees, meet with senior Obama adviser Valerie Jarrett to discuss strategy for addressing sexual assault in the military.
lead_paragraph: More than a dozen members of Congress, mostly women from the Senate and House Armed Services Committees, met with Valerie Jarrett, a senior adviser to Mr. Obama.

headline.seo: Lawmakers at White House Discuss Military Sex Abuse
headline.main: Lawmakers, at White House, Discuss Sex Abuse in Military
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers, at White House, Discuss Sex Abuse in Military

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
